   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_register_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -define(WAIT_TIME, 500).
   24: -define(RT_WAIT_TIME, 60000).
   25: 
   26: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   27:                       get_counter_value/1]).
   28: 
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: %% Suite configuration
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: 
   33: all() ->
   34:     [{group, registration}].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [{registration, [sequence], [register,
   38:                                  unregister]}].
   39: 
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}},
   42:      {require, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   43: 
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: %% Init & teardown
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: 
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   50: 
   51: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   53: 
   54: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   58:     ok.
   59: 
   60: init_per_testcase(unregister, Config) ->
   61:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
   62:     escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
   63:     Config;
   64: init_per_testcase(registered_users, Config) ->
   65:     XMPPDomain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   66:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
   67:                               [{auth_method, XMPPDomain}]) of
   68:         external ->
   69:             {skip, "counter not supported with ejabberd_auth_external"};
   70:         anonymous ->
   71:             {skip, "counter not supported with anonymous authentication"};
   72:         _ ->
   73:             Config
   74:     end;
   75: init_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: end_per_testcase(unregister, _Config) ->
   79:     ok;
   80: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
   81:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
   82:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, Alice).
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: %% Registration tests
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: 
   88: register(Config) ->
   89:     {value, Registarations} = get_counter_value(modRegisterCount),
   90: 
   91:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
   92:     escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
   93: 
   94:     assert_counter(Registarations + 1, modRegisterCount).
   95: 
   96: 
   97: unregister(Config) ->
   98:     {value, Deregistarations} = get_counter_value(modUnregisterCount),
   99: 
  100:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
  101:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, Alice),
  102: 
  103:     assert_counter(Deregistarations + 1, modUnregisterCount).
  104:
